get.description: Retrieves the contents of a recs offer by providing it's id.

put.summary: Update a recs offer by id

put.description: Update an audience with the new rules specified by the request data.

delete.description: Delete the audience referenced by the specified id.

get.summary: Get Behavior Targeted activity by id
get.description: Fetch the current definition of a Behavior Targeted  activity if it is found as referenced by the id.

put.description: Creates a new Behavior Targeted activity with the specified contents and returns the created activity.

delete.description: Deletes the Behavior Targeted activity that is referenced by the id, if it is found.

get.description: Fetch the current definition of a AB activity if it is found as referenced by the id.

put.description: Updates the AB activity definition with the contents as provided in the request. This can change the state and behaviour of an existing activity.

delete.description: Deletes the activity that is referenced by the id, if it is found.

delete.description: Deletes the activity that is referenced by the id, if it is found.
